problem_text_cn: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,∠A=110°,E,F分别是边AB和BC的中点,EP⊥CD于点P,则∠FPC=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the diamond ABCD, ∠A = N_0, E, F are the midvertices of edges AB and BC, respectively, EP ⊥ CD is at point P, then ∠FPC = ()
raw_answer:
解:延长PF交AB的延长线于点G.在△BGF与△CPF中,\begin{cases}
∠GBF=∠PCF\\
{BF=CF}\\
∠BFG=∠CFP\\
\end{cases}∴△BGF≌△CPF(ASA),∴GF=PF,∴F为PG中点.又∵由题可知,∠BEP=90°,(直角三角形斜边上的中线等于斜边的一半)∴EF=\frac{1}{2}PG(中点定义),∴EF=PF,∴∠FEP=∠EPF,∵∠BEP=∠EPC=90°∴∠BEP-∠FEP=∠EPC-∠EPF,即∠BEF=∠FPC,∵四边形ABCD为菱形,∴AB=BC,∠ABC=180°-∠A=70°,∵E,F分别为AB1BC的中点,∴BE=BF,∠BEF=∠BFE=\frac{1}{2}(180^{°}-70^{°})=55^{°}易证FE=FG,∴∠FGE=∠FEG=55°,∵AG||CD,∴∠FPC=∠EGF=55°故选:D.
